wikipedia_page.main:
Lewis Kidd (born 30 January 1995) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays for Edinburgh City, as a full back or midfielder.
Kidd has previously played for Celtic, Falkirk, two spells with Queen of the South,  East Kilbride, and Albion Rovers on loan.
Kidd has also represented Scotland at various youth levels.
